    • search

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Photo> search(String begin, String end) throws ParseException
      Find all photos that fit into the date range
      Parameters:
      begin - start date
      end - end date
      Returns:
      null if no results found and collection of photos if there are valid matches
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the dates are in incorrect format

    • search

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Photo> search(String byTag)
      Find all photos that match the tag query
      Parameters:
      byTag - query
      Returns:
      null if no results found and collection of photos if there are valid matches

    • copyPhoto

      public boolean copyPhoto(String from, String to, String path)
      Copy photo from one album to another
      Parameters:
      from - album to copy the photo from
      to - album to copy the photo to
      path - absolute path of the photo to be copied
      Returns:
      false if the from doesn't exist or if the to doesn't exist or if the from does not contain the photo or if the to already contains the photo and true otherwise

      to - album to copy the photo to

      Returns:

    • readUser

      public static User readUser(String name) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Unserialize the User instance from a .dat file.
      Parameters:
      name - username of User
      Returns:
      User instance of the corresponding username
      Throws:
      IOException - when path to file is incorrect
      ClassNotFoundException - when the class being cast is not the original class
